name: rchain-toolkit
description: Node JS utils and methods to interact with rchain's rnode api and proto interfaces

scripts.compile: tsc src/index.ts --outDir dist && cp -r src/protobuf dist/protobuf && cp -r src/pbjs dist/pbjs
scripts.compile:tests: tsc tests/index.ts --outDir testsc && cp -r src/protobuf testsc/src/protobuf && cp -r src/pbjs testsc/src/

author: FABCO
